doc.title: Back to the Garden, Flower Power Comes Full Circle
doc.plot: Twenty years ago, director Kevin Tomlinson traveled to Tonasket, a small town in Eastern Washington, where he interviewed a 'healing gathering' of back to the land movement 'hippies' practicing peace and love. Forty years after Woodstock, he tracked down the same folks and their children to find out what became of them and their search for environmental utopias.
